title: Perma Banned Account
body: why i got permanent bann and can i have my acc back, I will not flame again and if i do, you can ban me again. Thank u

replies.body: It looks like this account was punished for toxicity reasons and was escalated to a permanent ban. It's gone through the normal escalation so this won't be lifted, but if you didn't get the email or remember what warranted this ban you can always reach out to us in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) for that context.
